mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, GENDER_CODE, PHONE_NUM ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{birthDate}, #{genderCode}, #{phoneNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, USER_NAME as userName FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PW = #{userPw} -- 실제로는 암호화가 필요하지만 우선 평문으로 진행합니다. AND USER_YN = 'Y'
SELECT USER_ID as userId, USER_PW as userPw, USER_NAME as userName, BIRTH_DATE as birthDate, GENDER_CODE as genderCode, PHONE_NUM as phoneNum, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regDate FROM MEMBER
